page.title: 16 ST. PETER'S PARISH CHURCH
page.content: The oldest part of St. Peter's Church,Weedon Bec dates back to Norman times.Much of the building was enlarged and rebuilt in 1825 to accomodate military personnel from the {Royal Military Depot}. We visited our present vicar and asked him some questions.{The Revd.D. Witchell} has been vicar of Weedon for three and a half years and likes his job very much.He takes eight services a week on average. This is a day in his life:He gets up at 07.00 and goes to church at 07.45. After breakfast at 09.00 he does his correspondence.He has lunch at 13.00 hours and visits people in the afternoon.He goes bell ringing at 16.45 and goes to bed at 22.00 hours. There is also a {Roman Catholic Church} in West Street and a {United Reformed Church} in Church Street.
